subject: Re: [junit] What's wrong with using inner classes for tests?
msgSnippet: In addition to the comment about tests not 1-1 with classes, you ll also develop testing tools like mock objects for your internal components, particular

In addition to the comment about tests not 1-1 with classes, you'll
also develop testing tools like mock objects for your internal
components, particular setups, etc that you'll want to share between
tests.  This part goes beyond organization, they can't be inner classes
to be used properly.

-Kevin
